alert.note: Alert for Clay; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 3:09AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Clay, Wilkin, east central Ransom, southeastern Cass and Richland Counties through 345 AM CDT... At 309 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near McLeod to Mantador to Lake Traverse Reservation. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Mantador and McLeod around 310 AM CDT. Barney and Great Bend around 315 AM CDT. Mooreton, Lamars and Blackmer around 320 AM CDT. Fairmount, Dwight and Sonora around 325 AM CDT. Galchutt, Barrie and Tenney around 330 AM CDT. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 0 and 52. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
